data.text: @JeremyY87227152 Her wisdom is beyond her youth. Congrats to bring into this world such a promising youth.

@JeremyY87227152 I saw this regarding the treatment of people at Penny’s Bay - seems unbelievable that HKers would be treated so badly. It’s quarantine not prison!  There’re stories of travellers sent directly from the airport with nothing except their hand luggage and clothes they’re wearing. 😩 https://t.co/dtw6LpLQhk
@gbertram I will pass them onto our gov, I carry very similar views to you.
@gbertram Are these questions directed at me? Shouldn't these be directed at our government?

@JeremyY87227152 How can we have 20 infected people sharing a toilet? What are the shower facilities? Is there power in the rooms? Is there basic running water for drinking? This place looks like hell. HKers will be horrified being sent here.

@JeremyY87227152 Yes! Great to push vaccinations….. but something needs to be done to improve the conditions at some of these makeshift isolation facilities / hospitals. 

https://t.co/xNDZH4r4Gd
